Text: This torrent is a relatively fast download, but it's a much-shortened version of the complete film, and doesn't have the color-tinted sequences which define the four stories.  You would do much better to get the Kino version, a stunning restoration, for which a torrent is now up and running at TPB.  It is, however, a VIDEO_TS file and at 7.37 GB will take a while to download and can only be burnt onto a double-layer DVD.  But trust me: it's worth it!
